product_summary: Controlla Voice is a voice-controlled automation platform that lets you control your smart home devices, get the news, set alarms, and more, all with the power of your voice. It's easy to use, with a simple and intuitive interface. And it's compatible with a wide range of smart home devices, so you can use it to control everything from your lights to your thermostat.
product_pros: Compatible with a wide range of smart home devices
Lets you control your smart home devices, get the news, set alarms, and more, all with the power of your voice
Makes it easy to automate your home and make your life easier
product_cons: May not be compatible with all smart home devices

Can be difficult to set up

product_usecases.details: Controlla Voice lets you control your smart home devices with your voice. You can turn on the lights, adjust the thermostat, and lock the doors, all without lifting a finger.
Controlla Voice can give you the latest news headlines and weather updates. You can also ask it to play music, set alarms, and add items to your shopping list.
Controlla Voice can wake you up in the morning, remind you of appointments, and set timers. You can also use it to create routines that automate tasks, such as turning on the lights when you wake up.

Controlla Voice can help you automate your home and make your life easier. You can create routines that turn on the lights when you come home, adjust the thermostat when you go to bed, and lock the doors when you leave.

Controlla Voice can make your life easier in a number of ways. You can use it to control your smart home devices, get the news, set alarms, and more, all with the power of your voice. This can free up your time to do other things, such as spending time with your family and friends.

product_pricing: Controlla Voice is available in two pricing plans: a free plan and a premium plan. The free plan includes all of the basic features, such as voice control of your smart home devices, news and weather updates, and alarms and timers. The premium plan costs $4.99 per month and includes additional features, such as the ability to create routines, control multiple smart home devices at once, and access to a library of premium content.
